CustomField.description: This field will include any/all changes which the engineering manager has made to the GSR Submission record. This is a reflection of the differences between the physical certificate provided on site and the electronic certificate to be emailed to the account holder.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field should report any/all changes made to the GSR Submission record. Any/all changes, between the physical certificate provided on site and the electronic certificate, should be noted here.
CustomField.label: Record_Update_Notes
